properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 9 at 6:50PM CST until January 13 at 4:05AM CST by NWS Tulsa OK
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Oklahoma...

Illinois River near Watts affecting Adair and Delaware Counties.

Illinois River at Chewey affecting Adair...Cherokee and Delaware
Counties.

Illinois River near Tahlequah affecting Cherokee County.

Flint Creek near Kansas affecting Cherokee and Delaware Counties.

Baron Fork River at Eldon affecting Cherokee County.

Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County.

Kiamichi River near Antlers affecting Pushmataha County.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Poteau River near Panama.
* from Saturday afternoon to late Sunday night, or until the warning
is cancelled.
* At  6:30 PM Thursday, the stage was 12.97 feet.
* Flood stage is 29.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The Poteau River near Panama is expected to rise above
flood stage Saturday afternoon and continue to rise to near 31.9
feet by Sunday morning. The river is expected to fall below flood
stage late Sunday evening.
* Impact...At 31.0 feet, minor agricultural flooding occurs. Williams
Road east of Panama is flooded.
